Fighting: (agi) d8 Performance: (spi) d6 Thievery: (agi) d4
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common; Halfling
Skill Notes:
Keen Senses: +1 Notice step
Sure-Footed: +1 Athletics step
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Size: -1 Alignment: Neutral
Advances: 0 Improvement Points: 4 Improvement Points Allocation: Edge: 4
Description Notes: Size-1: -1 Size
Features
Edges (3 points): Danger Sense; Fame; Fighter Hindrances: Can't Swim; Cautious; Suspicious+ Halfling Features: Agile; Keen Senses; Lucky; Reduced Pace; Size -1; Sure-Footed
Feature Notes:
Fighter: Has Martial Flexibility feature
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Lucky: +1 Benny each session
Suspicious+: Allies suffer -2 on Support rolls
Combat
Parry: 7 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d4
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)

Fighting Parry Modifier: +4 Parry
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run step
Size-1: -1 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
